001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.drivers.factory;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.drivers.base.DriverProvider;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.drivers.config.WebDriverConfig;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.log.LogUi;
006import java.net.MalformedURLException;
007import java.net.URL;
008import java.util.Optional;
009import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
010import org.openqa.selenium.remote.AbstractDriverOptions;
011import org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver;
012
013/**
014 * Creates WebDriver instances based on the provided configuration and driver provider.
015 *
016 * <p>This class is responsible for setting up WebDriver options, applying necessary configurations,
017 * and instantiating the WebDriver either locally or remotely.
018 *
019 * <p>The generic type {@code T} represents browser-specific configuration options that extend
020 * {@link AbstractDriverOptions}. This allows flexibility in defining WebDriver settings
021 * for different browsers, such as Chrome, Firefox, or Edge.
022 *
023 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
024 */
025public class DriverCreator<T extends AbstractDriverOptions<?>> {
026
027   /**
028    * Creates and configures a WebDriver instance based on the given configuration and driver provider.
029    *
030    * @param config   The configuration settings for the WebDriver instance.
031    * @param provider The driver provider responsible for creating and configuring WebDriver options.
032    * @return A fully configured {@link WebDriver} instance.
033    * @throws MalformedURLException If the remote WebDriver URL is invalid.
034    */
035   public WebDriver createDriver(WebDriverConfig<T> config, DriverProvider<T> provider) throws MalformedURLException {
036      LogUi.info("Creating driver using provider [{}]. Headless: [{}], Remote: [{}], Remote URL: [{}]",
037            provider.getClass().getSimpleName(),
038            config.isHeadless(),
039            config.isRemote(),
040            config.getRemoteUrl());
041
042
043      T options = provider.createOptions();
044      provider.applyDefaultArguments(options);
045
046      if (config.isHeadless()) {
047         provider.applyHeadlessArguments(options);
048      }
049
050      Optional.ofNullable(config.getOptionsCustomizer()).ifPresent(customizer -> customizer.accept(options));
051
052      WebDriver driver;
053
054      if (config.isRemote()) {
055         driver = new RemoteWebDriver(new URL(config.getRemoteUrl()), options);
056      } else {
057         driver = provider.createDriver(options);
058      }
059
060      driver.manage().window().maximize();
061
062      return Optional.ofNullable(config.getEventFiringDecorator())
063            .map(decorator -> decorator.decorate(driver))
064            .orElse(driver);
065   }
066
067}
